AboutPage.title: About us
AboutPage.description: This is the about page of our application.

Global.description: Trusted BPR in Indonesia, providing secure and accessible banking services for all. We are committed to delivering the best banking experience with the latest technology.
Global.enjoy_digital: Enjoy Convenience of Digital Banking Services
Global.participant_in_guarantee: And is a participant in the Guarantee from
Global.intro_sentosa: Let's get you introduced to Sentosa Bank
Global.manage_finance: Manage all your financial needs in an easy, fun, and profitable way.
Global.why_choose_sentosa_bank: Why you have to choose Bank Sentosa?
Global.manage_money_all_in_one: Manage your money, top up, invest, and more — all in one app.
Global.about_description: BPR Karya Prima Sentosa is one of the people's economic banks in Indonesia that continues to innovate in order to improve the quality of service and ensure transaction security for customers.
Global.who_we_are_description: PT. BPR Karya Prima Sentosa has been operating since 1994. And has changed its name several times, and became PT. BPR Karya Prima Sentosa.
Global.commitment: PT. BPR Karya Prima Sentosa is committed to having quality human resources, quality products and fast processes to serve customers and develop people's economic businesses.
Global.vision: To become a trusted, reliable BPR, providing the best and professional services to become one of the largest and leading BPRs.
Global.mission_1: Providing financing to micro, small and medium-scale productive businesses with fast and precise services while still paying attention to the principle of prudence.
Global.mission_2: Providing professional service by giving more than what each customer expects (Service Excellent) so that customers become more loyal to BPR.
Global.mission_3: Building a safe, conducive working environment, providing fulfillment and opportunities for improving the quality of Human Resources who are honest, trustworthy, have integrity and can work more effectively and efficiently.
Global.mission_4: Enhance risk culture and inherent oversight.
Global.mission_5: Improving cooperation with Commercial Banks and BPR (Linkage Program).
Global.policy_1: Running a BPR business based on the principle of prudence.
Global.policy_2: Carrying out business activities in a healthy manner, always adhering to policies and procedures.
Global.policy_3: Carrying out recording and presenting reports in accordance with the accounting standards applicable to BPR.
Global.policy_4: To be the market leader on both funding and credit sides in the working area.
Global.policy_5: Carrying out business and operational processes that rely on Information Technology (IT).
Global.policy_6: Developing human resources who have competence in their respective fields.
Global.savings_description: BPR Sentosa savings products are very flexible and provide savings interest at very competitive interest rates.
Global.safe_lps: Safe, because it is included in the deposit guarantee program at the Deposit Insurance Corporation (LPS)
Global.deposit_description: For those of you who have extra funds and want to ensure a safe, profitable investment option with a variety of optional facilities, take advantage of Deposits as your best choice right now.
Global.high_interest: High interest up to the maximum LPS deposit interest guarantee
Global.aro: Free to extend deposits automatically (Automatic Roll Over / ARO)
Global.interest_option: Interest can be placed back into the principal deposit or transferred to your savings account which can be withdrawn at any time.
Global.personal_service: Personalized services from Personal Banking Officers who will serve you wholeheartedly
Global.working_capital_description: Working Capital Credit Facility for the purpose of developing micro, small and medium enterprises for trade, industry, construction, services, etc.
Global.working_capital_cta: Take advantage of working capital credit facilities from BPR Sentosa to develop and expand your business network.
Global.debtor_age_condition: The minimum age of the debtor is 21 years and at the time the loan matures the maximum age is 60 years.
Global.house_ownership_condition: Have your own house (if you don't have a house, there must be a personal guarantee from parents who own a house)
Global.sid_condition: SID clear 2 years / maximum collectibility 2 paid off
Global.business_age_condition: The business must have been running for at least 2 years
Global.investment_credit_description: Take advantage of investment credit from BPR Sentosa to finance the purchase of business production equipment, modernize your business machines or as capital for expanding and developing new businesses.
Global.consumer_credit_description: Take advantage of investment credit from BPR Sentosa to finance customer needs, especially those related to consumption activities.
Global.personal_credit_usage: Personal Credit that can be used for
